about_the_game:
In the game every choice matters, so having an integrated walkthrough might help you achieve the ending you wish.

The Gold version adds to the base game a way to see the outcome of each choice and how it would impact the gameplay.

The Gold version is compatible with any Season.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game shows explicit sexual scenes, usage of drugs and violence. 

All sexual acts in the game are consensual and none of the characters involved in any sexual acts are under the legal age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
